snippet.title: TankHead - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on a thrilling journey as Whitaker, piloting a drone-controlled tank through the desolate ECA. Battle fierce enemies, scavenge valuable parts, and fight to survive in this fast-paced sci-fi world, as you strive to reach the mysterious Highpoint.

FIGHT TO REACH HIGHPOINT
As Whitaker your goal is to fight to reach Highpoint, to do that you must traverse the ECA – an area where humans cannot survive. Whitaker must project his mind into a Needle, a robust drone capable of surviving in the harsh conditions of the ECA – and of piloting your Tank. Use your Needle and Tank to combat the vehicles and creatures of the ECA to reach Highpoint.

RICH, DETAILED SCI-FI WORLD
Explore the ECA a world torn apart by war and a mysterious cataclysmic event that left it uninhabitable by humans. Where humans must “tele-project” their minds into drones in order to survive and pillage the remains of a once great society.

FAST-PACED TANK COMBAT
Your vehicle of choice is a Light Tank; capable of moving quickly and delivering devastating damage to your enemies and the reactive world around you. Your tank can be equipped with various weapons, armor, wheels, motors and abilities to customize your gameplay.

DISMANTLE AND DESTROY
Use a variety of weaponry to dismantle your enemies, blow off parts, to get a clear shot at their vulnerable weak points to deliver decisive blows. Defeated enemies leave behind their remaining parts for you to salvage or steal. Take what you need, scrap the rest. Use everything to survive.


Tankhead on the Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/tankhead-2f3b51 

Website: https://www.tankhead.com/
Twitter: https://x.com/playtankhead
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@tankhead
